title: Question about riot staff just curious.
body: How long does it usually take for a riot staff reply when submitting a ticket?

replies.body: Ive been waiting for 2 hours since they replied to my message.
About a few minutes to tell you that they won't be replying for a long time. Then it's usually a day after that they get a robot to send you an automated response. How long have you been waiting for?
